Articles.Content: I don't suppose anyone's made a patch so the tanks can be used without IFS?
Does anyone still have a download of the MBI retro parts none of the downloads work

[@Virtualgenius](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/67644-virtualgenius/) While it looks like I might not have the last, latest version of of the Retro Parts, and for anyone who wants ANY of the MBI mods, heres a .zip that includes my whole collection of the MBI mods:  
![sAerNUT.png](https://i.imgur.com/sAerNUT.png)  

I know its large at ~228MB, but I would rather host one large file, than a bunch of individual files.  

I'm not sure how long i will keep this hosted on my GoogleDrive, so if anyone wants it,  

I SUGGEST GRABBING IT NOW!!  
  
[Monkey Business Inc.- ALL mods.zip](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LGwPqQEltat9KfYLJpNEHivtSo9pHxDw/view?usp=sharing)
[@Stone Blue](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/77721-stone-blue/) thx for this, i also was searching for it....this should be archived somewhere as to not get lost

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, dtoxic said:
> 
> 
> [@Stone Blue](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/77721-stone-blue/) thx for this, i also was searching for it....this should be archived somewhere as to not get lost
> 

Yup... thats \*exactly\* what I do! ~~Hoard~~  ,uhh, ~~Collect~~ ... I mean \*Archive\* every version, of EVERY KSP mod EVER made, that I can get my hands on. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")  

I have over 300 GB of mod .zip files (and source files)... I pretty much have not only basically the whole SpaceDock database on my computer, but even way over and above that. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
Thankyou and and I pray your computer never fails I wish the author had made some legs for the luna 17 lander

> 
> 
> 55 minutes ago, Virtualgenius said:
> 
> 
> Thankyou and and I pray your computer never fails I wish the author had made some legs for the luna 17 lander
> 

Hmmm ... Tantares doesnt have any?
Does anyone made a patch for 1.12.2?  Atm most of the parst are only for decor, none of them have fuel or anything else

I'm working on a Re Do of the MBI Parts (except the Orion Parts but maybe)

Cfgs are mostly finished but spare time is rare time and need to relearn Modelling and Texturing for refreshed models and textures of the Octo Lander Parts and other

At the Moment the old parts are usable with the Interstellar Fuel Switch. Solar Panels use the Near Future Solar Plugin. I should change that maybe too

Thanks to [@Stone Blue](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/77721-stone-blue/) for your backup. Found only the octo Parts on my old machine
I really like the ramped lander but it needs some decent legs to go with it squad legs are terrible they just dont look good
